templates.title: PTP4L (host)
templates.description: Precision Time Protocol Daemon for Linux with `host` networking

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container Name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname, and studio name for an Altus

env.name: PTP4L_ARGS
env.label: ptp4l command line args
env.description: Command line arguments for ptp4l. Details here: linux.die.net/man/8/ptp4l. Leave blank if unsure

env.name: TAG

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME

env.description: Set the container name, hostname, and studio name for an Altus

env.name: AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: AOIP IP Address
env.description: IP Address for the AoIP Network

env.name: EXT_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: External IP Address
env.description: IP Address for the External Network. The external network the non-AoIP network. The network that can connect to the internet, a license server, etc.

templates.title: Telos VXS (dual-macvlan)
templates.description: Telos VXS VoIP Phone System with `macvlan` networking

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container Name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname, and studio name for an Altus

env.name: AOIP_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: AOIP IP Address
env.description: IP Address for the AoIP Network

env.name: EXT_IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: External IP Address
env.description: IP Address for the External Network. The external network the non-AoIP network. The network that can connect to the internet, a license server, etc.

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container Name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname, and studio name for an Altus

env.name: IFACE_AOIP
env.label: AoIP Network Interface
env.description: Name of Ethernet Interface for AoIP traffic. Use IFADDR_ANY for kernel routing

env.name: EX_CLOCK_SOURCE
env.label: Audio timebase source
env.description: Options: [ptp-snooping] Software PTP. Recommended in most cases | [clock-tai] OS TAI time | [/dev/ptp0] PTP hardware timestamp device

env.name: EX_AOIP_CLOCK
env.label: AoIP Clock Type
env.description: Applies to 'ptp-snooping' only, type of clock packets to receive: [0] PTP | [1] Livewire

env.name: EX_PTP_DOMAIN
env.label: PTP Domain Number
env.description: Applies to ptp-snooping with PTP packets only: Domain Number of PTP master

env.name: EX_AOIP_TASK_RATE
env.label: Task Execution
env.description: Set the rate at which AoIP packets are sent. This not packet length. It is how frequently packets are sent. The default is 1000 and ideal for most systems. More latency sensitive system should use lower numbers.

env.name: EX_RT_CPU
env.label: Realtime Reserved CPU
env.description: CPU number (using OS numbering) on which Forza will always run realtime tasks and never run non-realtime tasks. Leave blank to run all tasks on all CPUs

env.name: HTTP_PORT
env.label: Web Interface TCP Port
env.description: TCP Port used to run the web server that serves the GUI and API

env.name: TAG
env.label: Software version tag
env.description: Version of software. Leave blank to use default

env.name: INSTANCE_NAME
env.label: Container Name
env.description: Set the container name, hostname, and studio name for an Altus

env.name: IPV4_ADDRESS
env.label: IPv4 Address
env.description: Static IPv4 address to assign to the container. REQUIRED

env.name: IFACE_AOIP
env.label: AoIP Network Interface
env.description: Name of Ethernet Interface for AoIP traffic. Use IFADDR_ANY for kernel routing

env.name: EX_CLOCK_SOURCE
env.label: Audio timebase source
env.description: Options: [ptp-snooping] Software PTP. Recommended in most cases | [clock-tai] OS TAI time | [/dev/ptp0] PTP hardware timestamp device

env.name: EX_AOIP_CLOCK
env.label: AoIP Clock Type
env.description: Applies to 'ptp-snooping' only, type of clock packets to receive: [0] PTP | [1] Livewire

env.name: EX_PTP_DOMAIN
env.label: PTP Domain Number
env.description: Applies to ptp-snooping with PTP packets only: Domain Number of PTP master

env.name: EX_AOIP_TASK_RATE
env.label: Task Execution
env.description: Set the rate at which AoIP packets are sent. This not packet length. It is how frequently packets are sent. The default is 1000 and ideal for most systems. More latency sensitive system should use lower numbers.

env.name: EX_RT_CPU
env.label: Realtime Reserved CPU
env.description: CPU number (using OS numbering) on which Forza will always run realtime tasks and never run non-realtime tasks. Leave blank to run all tasks on all CPUs

env.name: HTTP_PORT
env.label: Web Interface TCP Port
env.description: TCP Port used to run the web server that serves the GUI and API
